name: MixtapeZ
description:
You are Alex.  Someone who still uses 80's technology. You are the last hope of humanity as the zombie boombox masses rises.

This project has been built in 2 weeks for the Super Rare Mixtape Jam #1.

Move with the WASD keys (or ZQSD in French language), shoot with the left mouse button. Kill as many as you can to score big.

Music attribution:

Here Be Dragons by Tim Kulig

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/8523-here-be-dragons
